attributes.action: pause before rushing through the implementation of the Parliamentary Standards Bill.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To anticipate writing off hundreds of years of Parliamentary authority, by the introduction of an "oversight" quango in the matter of just a few weeks, is bordering on the criminal. If MPs cannot be trusted sufficiently as to require such an `oversight` body, then a wider - to include the voters - and more importantly, lengthier consultation process is called for.
